availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Benjamin Nones (New York County, New York, lawyer, commissioner of deeds, and notary)

body.p: New York County, New York, attorney, commissioner of deeds, and notary public. Pennsylvania native. Son of Benjamin Nones and Miriam Marks Nones. Married to Eveline Leon Nones in New York County, New York, on July 24, 1823. Father of Serena Nones, Leonara Nones, Alexander H. Nones, and Emily D. Nones. Attorney in New York County in 1857. Attorney in New York County in 1861. Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in New York County in 1861. Attorney in New York County in 1862. Notary in New York County in 1863. Attorney in New York County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
